story_galar_02_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Apparently, in various areas on Pasio...
story_galar_02_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Champion Leon has been hosting Pokémon battle
events focused on using sync stones.
story_galar_02_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I see... That certainly sounds like something
he’d do.
story_galar_02_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
However, I expected he’d show he has an
opposing view.
story_galar_02_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’ll proceed with my next step, then.
story_galar_02_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Yes, please prepare for the announcement.
story_galar_02_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: The announcement of their incredible inventions...
